name: 0933d65b-5879-459e-82c4-9c1968ad4db6

playbookOutput.executionSummary:
Customer: "Hi, I was recently prescribed a specialty medication. I want to know if my plan covers it and how much I would need to pay."

Agent: "Sure, I can help with that. May I have the name of the medication and your plan ID?"

Customer: "Yes, the medication is [Medication Name], and my plan ID is [Plan ID]."

Agent: "Thank you. Let me check... Your plan does cover [Medication Name], but it's subject to prior authorization to ensure it's used appropriately. After approval, you have a copayment of $[Amount] for a month's supply."

Customer: "How do I get the prior authorization?"

Agent: "Your healthcare provider will need to submit a prior authorization request on your behalf. They'll include your medical history and the reason for prescribing this specific medication. Once we receive the request, it's typically processed within [X] business days."

displayName: Inquiry About Coverage for Specialty Medication
